title: NOS Parts and more for STANFORD HALL

posts.content:
I can take parts to stanford hall, for pre arranged collection.

I have a large collection of parts, including many NOS parts.

View all my current ads here; http://www.thesamba.com/vw/classifieds/search.php?username=Jonesy

Some examples of parts I can take are;

--------------------------------

Genuine Original VW NOS (new old stock) Type 2 splitscreen 64-67 (late 22mm) link pin kit.

NOT TO BE CONFUSED WITH THE REPRO ITEMS WITH PLASTIC BEARING CAGES - THESE ARE ORIGINAL METAL BEARING CAGES THAT WILL LAST FOR YEARS!

£115

I also have the seal and spacer kit for these; http://www.thesamba.com/vw/classifieds/detail.php?id=1826786

£125 for a link pin set with the above seal and spacer set



----------------------------------

Genuine Original VW NOS (new old stock) Type 2 splitscreen pre 64 early 20mm link pin needle roller bearing and bearing race.

£12 each
or £40 for 4

Price is for the needle bearing and bearing race, packed with grease and still wrapped well in its original grease paper.

These are very hard to find now... NOT TO BE CONFUSED WITH THE REPRO ITEMS WITH PLASTIC BEARING CAGES - THESE ARE ORIGINAL METAL BEARING CAGES THAT WILL LAST FOR YEARS!

Note; there's no rust on these at all - anything that might look like rust is grease. They are properly packed with thick brown grease and there's lots of it, so no chance of rust at all.



------------------------------

Brand new Type 2 splitscreen 60-67 nose cone kit;

Nose cone
Hockey stick
Reverse switch blanking plug and washer
Nose cone mounting gasket.

Useful for straight axle conversions and for fitting late boxes into pre 60 type 1 and 2's.

£90



-------------------------------------

Brand new Type 2 splitscreen 55-67 radio dash repair section;

£90



-------------------------------------

LHD or RHD Stainless steel steering box guard

http://www.ssvc.org.uk/phpbb/viewtopic.php?f=4&t=48368&hilit=steering+box+guard

£35

-------------------------------------

Cheers,
Neil

PS. Email or text is best for me to arrange things

07980 298109
boatyardbuses@aol.com

Check out my ads here as i've just reduced a load of items to clear

http://www.thesamba.com/vw/classifieds/ ... ame=Jonesy

Cheers,
Neil
Hi, could I have dash repair panel and meet up at Stanford hall Sunday please, thanks Andy
Yes no problem mate thanks, give me a call on 07980 298109 when you're there
